name: Ocean Aviation Flight Academy
about: Ocean Aviation Flight Academy, located in Berlin, Maryland, and with a second location at the Delaware Coastal Airport, is a FAA Approved 141 Flight School offering comprehensive flight training programs. Founded in 2007 by Michael Freed, the academy aims to provide world-class flight training, recognized by the FAA and the Veterans Administration. We offer Private, Instrument, and Commercial Flight Training, as well as an Accelerated ProPilot Course that prepares students for a career as a professional airline pilot in as little as eight months. Our full-time instructors provide personalized attention, and we are SEVIS approved to accept international students. With state-of-the-art facilities, including a Redbird FMX Full Motion Flight Simulator, and a fleet of Cessna 172 Skyhawk aircraft, we ensure a superior learning environment. Our mission is to serve students with professional, world-class training, helping them achieve their aviation goals.
services:

Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
